questions.question: Which of the following people are safe to meet offline?

choices.answer: Someone from your favourite online game
Someone from a chat room about your favourite artist
Someone who says they know your brother
It is never safe to meet someone you met online

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT an example of Cyber Bullying?

choices.answer: Sending a mean text message or email
Tweeting an embarrassing picture of a friend on Twitter
Creating a Facebook page to target a specific person
Tripping a student in the hallway at school

questions.question: A good Digital Citizen is a safe, responsible and positive participant in the digital world.

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: What can you do to protect your Digital Footprint?

choices.answer: Manage your privacy settings
Think before you post & do not post negative content online
Be mindful that what you post today may follow you tomorrow
All of the above

questions.question: What did Popcorn learn at the end of the story The Fabulous Friend Machine?

choices.answer: It's OK to meet a friend offline if they seem nice online
Everyone you meet online is safe to talk to
You never really know who you are talking to online
The more screen time, the better!

questions.question: What should you do when you witness Cyber Bullying?

choices.answer: Report bullying to an adult that you can trust
Leave negative websites, conversations or groups
Do not comment, share or post negative content online
All of the above

questions.question: The commercial we watched was created to raise awareness about what issue?

choices.answer: Digital Footprint
Cyber Bullying
Cyber Safety
Bullying
Considers their safety when navigating the digital world
Is aware of the risks and benefits of posting online
Is responsible for their actions online
All of the above
